response.overview: Recorded at the legendary Boston Comedy Festival, James Scott Pattersonâ€™s latest special, Superior Design, delivers a little bit of everything. From classic one-liners to formal letters written to random billionaires asking for money, James dissects childhood, cryptozoology, pretending to be possessed by the devil, and even the poorly defined scoring system that governs wet t-shirt contests.
response.title: James Scott Patterson: Superior Design
